settings.heading: Introduction
settings.content: We want you to love every product you purchase from us. If something isn’t right, we’ll do our best to make it right. Please read our return policy carefully before requesting a return.

settings.heading: 1. Eligibility for Returns
settings.content:
You may request a return within 14 days of receiving your order.

Items must be unused, unopened, and in their original packaging.

Due to hygiene and safety regulations, used or opened nail products (such as gel polishes, top/base coats, liquids, brushes, files, and nail tools) cannot be returned.

Custom or personalized items are non-refundable unless defective.

settings.heading: 2. Non-Returnable Items
settings.content:
• Opened or used nail products
  • Clearance or final sale items
  • Gift cards
  • Items showing signs of wear or use

settings.heading: 3.Damaged or Incorrect Items
settings.content:
If your order arrives damaged or incorrect, please contact us at [email@example.com] within 48 hours of delivery. Include:

  • Your order number
  • A description of the issue
  • Clear photos of the item and packaging

We will arrange a replacement or a refund, depending on the case.

settings.heading: 4. Return Process
settings.content:
1. Email us at nailmarketusa.info@gmail.com with your order number and reason for return.
  2. Wait for return authorization and shipping instructions.
  3. Ship the item back using a trackable shipping method. The customer is responsible for return shipping unless the return is due to our error.

settings.heading: 5. Refunds
settings.content:
Once we receive and inspect your return, we will process your refund to the original payment method within 3–7 business days.

Shipping costs are non-refundable, unless the return is due to our mistake.

Our priority is your satisfaction. If you have any concerns or questions about a product or your order, feel free to reach out — we're happy to help!
